tool.name: Beacon2 Import
tool.command: beacon2-search range --db-host '$db_host' --db-port $db_port --database $database --collection $collection #if str($advanced_settings.authenticated_access.auth_req) == "yes": $advanced_settings.authenticated_access.advance_connection --db-auth-source $advanced_settings.authenticated_access.db_auth_source --db-user $advanced_settings.authenticated_access.db_user --db-password $advanced_settings.authenticated_access.db_password #end if --referenceName $referenceName --start $start --end $end #if str($advanced_settings.alternateBases) --alternateBases $advanced_settings.alternateBases #end if #if str($advanced_settings.variantType) --variantType $advanced_settings.variantType #end if #if str($advanced_settings.aminoacidChange) --aminoacidChange $advanced_settings.aminoacidChange #end if #if str($advanced_settings.variantMinLength) --variantMinLength $advanced_settings.variantMinLength #end if #if str($advanced_settings.variantMaxLength) --variantMaxLength $advanced_settings.variantMaxLength #end if > ranged_query_findings.txt

param.label: REFERENCENAME
param.help: Reference name in numbers chr1/1, chr2/2, chr3/3, etc.

param.label: ALTERNATEBASES
param.help: Targeted Alternate bases to search for

param.label: VARIANT TYPE
param.help: Targeted Variant type to search for

param.label: AMINOACID CHANGE
param.help: Targeted Amino acid change to search for

param.label: VARIANT MIN LENGTH
param.help: Targeted Variant minimum length to search for

param.label: VARIANT MAX LENGTH
param.help: Targeted VVariant maximum length to search for

tool.help: Beacon Range Queries are supposed to return matches of any variant with at least partial overlap of the sequence range specified by reference_name, start and end parameters
